# url

rundeck server url.

## SYNOPSIS

        --url <$RUNDECK_URL>

## README

Defaults to the environment variable: ${RUNDECK_URL}

## COMMANDS

The following commands use this option.

* [system-info](../../commands/system-info/index.html)

## METADATA

* `NAME` = url
* `DESCRIPTION` = "rundeck server url."
* `ARGUMENTS` = true
* `REQUIRED` = true
* `SHORT` = 
* `LONG` = url
* `DEFAULT` = $RUNDECK_URL
* `EXPORT` = true
